sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_S07_020EMPL010 ( COMPANY_CODE, PERSON_ID, EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, EMPLOYEE_NAME, GRADE_CODE, GRADE_NAME, GROUP_MANAGER_CODE, POSITIONGROUP_NAME, JOB_SEQ, JOB_CODE, JOB_NAME, HIRE_DATE, RETIRED_DATE, WORK_LOCATION, WORK_LOCATION_NAME, ORGANIZATION_SEQ, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ORGANIZATION_NAME, HAND_PHONE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, EMAIL_ADDRESS, CURRENT_JOB, PER_JOB_UPDATE_DATE, OFFICE_NUMBER, EMPLOYEE_CHINESE_NAME, ORGANIZATION_CHANGE_DATE, DATE_OF_BIRTH, PAYROLL_NAME, HR_DISPATCH_ORG_CODE, HR_JOB_PAYRG_BCX_ID, HR_JOB_PAYRG_BCX_NM, HR_JOB_PART_GRD_ID, HR_JOB_PART_GRD_TP, HR_JOB_PART_GRD_NM, CREATED_OBJECT_TYPE, CREATED_OBJECT_ID, CREATED_PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_TYPE, LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID, LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, DECIDE_PERSON_ID, MANAGER_FLAG, GROUP_SORTING_NUM, TITLE_CODE, TITLE_NAME ) VALUES ( #COMPANY_CODE#, #PERSON_ID#, #EMPLOYEE_NUMBER#, #EMPLOYEE_NAME#, #GRADE_CODE#, #GRADE_NAME#, #GROUP_MANAGER_CODE#, #POSITIONGROUP_NAME#, #JOB_SEQ#, #JOB_CODE#, #JOB_NAME#, #HIRE_DATE#, #RETIRED_DATE#, #WORK_LOCATION#, #WORK_LOCATION_NAME#, #ORGANIZATION_SEQ#, #ORGANIZATION_CODE#, #ORGANIZATION_NAME#, #HAND_PHONE#, #LAST_UPDATE_DATE#, #EMAIL_ADDRESS#, #CURRENT_JOB#, #PER_JOB_UPDATE_DATE#, #OFFICE_NUMBER#, #EMPLOYEE_CHINESE_NAME#, #ORGANIZATION_CHANGE_DATE#, #DATE_OF_BIRTH#, #PAYROLL_NAME#, #HR_DISPATCH_ORG_CODE#, #HR_JOB_PAYRG_BCX_ID#, #HR_JOB_PAYRG_BCX_NM#, #HR_JOB_PART_GRD_ID#, #HR_JOB_PART_GRD_TP#, #HR_JOB_PART_GRD_NM#, #CREATED_OBJECT_TYPE#, #CREATED_OBJECT_ID#, #CREATED_PROGRAM_ID#, #CREATION_TIMESTAMP#, #LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_TYPE#, #LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID#, #LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID#, #LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP#, #DECIDE_PERSON_ID#, #MANAGER_FLAG#, #GROUP_SORTING_NUM#, #TITLE_CODE#, #TITLE_NAME# )
